data.title: SageTV Supports Windows Home Server
data.meta_description: SageTV has announced support for Windows Home Server. Unless they’ve coded some specialized WHS hooks, the functionality was already present… All computer-based media center/DVR software really should be able to utilize external or network storage devices. “We’re excited to work with SageTV and make compelling digital entertainment capabilities available to Windows Home Server customers,” said ... Read more
data.text:
SageTV has announced support for Windows Home Server. Unless they’ve coded some specialized WHS hooks, the functionality was already present… All computer-based media center/DVR software really should be able to utilize external or network storage devices.

“We’re excited to work with SageTV and make compelling digital entertainment capabilities available to Windows Home Server customers,” said Steven Van Roekel, director of Windows Server Solutions at Microsoft.
